description: Overview* This MHL to HDMI adapter is designed for the Galaxy S3, Galaxy S4, Galaxy Note 2 and Note 3 that have 11 pin Micro USB ports.* It allows you to view videos, games, photos and other media from your Samsung smart phones directly onto an HDTV at 1080p resolution and 7.1 channel surround sound.Instructions1) Hook up your Galaxy S3/Galaxy S4 or Galaxy Note 2/Note 3 to your TV using this MHL to HDMI adapter and an HDMI cable (not included in packaging)2) Plug in a USB charging cable to the Micro USB female socket on this MHL to HDMI adapterto provide power to the chipsetSpecifications* Supports Galaxy S3, Galaxy S4, Galaxy Note 2 and Galaxy Note 3* Supports up to 1080p resolution at all bandwidth between 25-75MHz* Supports 7.1 channel surround sound, 192KHz audio transmission* Premium shielded jacket reduces electromagnetic interferenceImportant Note* Built-in USB port only supplies power for the adapter. It does not charge your smartphone device.* This MHL adapter features a USB Micro-B (female) power input. Connect the conventional Micro USB charging cable to the MHL adapter when use this adapter
title: Cable Matters MHL to HDMI Adapter for Samsung Galaxy S3/S4 and Note 2/Note 3 in Black
